name: Forest Tiger
description: The TIGER traffic platform is the first DAO mechanism public chain platform developed by an international DAO organization in the form of donations to support global technical teams. The first chain game "TIGER Forest King" on the TIGER traffic platform was launched in the form of DAO for global promotion. In May, In May, the promotion mechanism 1.0 (aggregation destruction, output destruction, and guaranteed price destruction) was launched, allowing global fans to obtain the TIGER forest king, the TIGER forest king is The platform currency of the entire TIGER traffic platform (similar to BNB of Binance Chain). If you have the king of the TIGER forest, you can participate in all the game ecology launched by the TIGER traffic platform, and the future value can be expected.
